titleNullable: Stock price with Sentiment Scores - ADANI
subtitleNullable: Dataset with historical data and sentiment score
descriptionNullable:
The data for the historical prices was taken from Yfinance.
The sentiment scores of the news articles scrapped from the web. The values were imputed using forward fill.
The dataset is from 1st November, 2010 to 22th October, 2023.
Comprises of 3200 rows of timeseries data.
